articles.title: ‘We’re here to stay:' The Giants have found secret to winning, and it's there for all to see - USA TODAY
articles.description: The Giants' 11-5 record produced by a rotating cast of contributors feels a good bit like last season and, perhaps, like the new normal in S.F.
articles.content:
One hundred and seven wins can do a lot for a ballclub.
